meanings.definition: The act of applying a dado to a surface.
meanings.sent1: The dadoing on the wall added a decorative touch to the room.
meanings.sent2: He learned dadoing by watching his grandfather work on the shelves.
meanings.sent3: The dadoing on the door made it look like a secret entrance to a magical world.
meanings.sent4: Her precision in dadoing was like an artist sculpting a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The dadoing stood out, making the whole room feel more elegant.

meanings.definition: The process of creating a dado in woodworking.
meanings.sent1: Woodworkers use dadoing to join pieces of wood together securely.
meanings.sent2: The dadoing required careful measurements and precise cuts.
meanings.sent3: During the woodworking class, they joked that dadoing was like creating puzzle pieces.
meanings.sent4: His skill in dadoing was as smooth as a carpenter's plane gliding over wood.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the saw echoed through the workshop as he worked on dadoing.

meanings.definition: The technique of installing a dado in construction.
meanings.sent1: The construction crew demonstrated the proper dadoing method to the new workers.
meanings.sent2: Dadoing in construction requires a steady hand and attention to detail.
meanings.sent3: The playful cat seemed fascinated by the dadoing happening in the room.
meanings.sent4: The dadoing in the building process was like fitting pieces of a giant puzzle together.
meanings.sent5: The dadoing was completed swiftly, adding a professional finish to the project.
